reviewText: I really enjoyed this book and shared it with my college class. It was great!
Fantastic history, great documentary, must see to appreciate.

I have every book and video on Madiba so this was just another added to my knowledge base. I found it most informative and would recommend it to anyone with a desire for authentically based information.
great book, a man of the ages, Often it is better to be a part of history than to sit and study history
I enjoyed the documentary and very educational and I was so moved that I want my children to watch and learned.

If you have not seen this DVD you are missing out
on a great story. This is a must see viedo and you won't be
disappointed. One of the great men of our century I have
watched it over and over and I learn something
new about South Africas President.
